description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在宁波会见了马来西亚前首相马哈迪·莫哈末一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad and his delegation in Ningbo.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在深圳主持座谈会，会见了香港特区行政长官李家超。
description.en: Xia Baolong chaired a symposium in Shenzhen and met with Hong Kong SAR Chief Executive John Lee Ka-chiu.

description.zh-cn: 在2019年反对逃犯条例修订草案运动后，夏宝龙于2020年2月13日被任命兼任国务院港澳事务办公室主任，以应对香港局势。
description.en: Following the 2019 Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement, Xia Baolong was appointed to concurrently serve as Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council on February 13, 2020, to handle the situation in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙将“反修例运动”定性为“颜色革命”和“黑暴”，并做出强硬表态准备出手抗击，体现其反对立场。
description.en: Xia Baolong labeled the 'Anti-Extradition Law Movement' as a 'color revolution' and 'black violence,' and made a tough stance to prepare for a counterattack, reflecting his opposition.

description.zh-cn: 袁崇焕在宁远之战和宁锦之战中，两次成功指挥明军击败后金的进攻。
description.en: Yuan Chonghuan successfully commanded the Ming forces to defeat the Later Jin invasions twice, in the Battle of Ningyuan and the Battle of Ningjin.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆皇帝下诏为袁崇焕平反，肯定他“尚能忠于所事”，认为其罹难是因“主暗政昏”，深表悯恻。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor issued an edict posthumously rehabilitating Yuan Chonghuan, affirming that he was 'loyal to his duty' and attributing his tragic fate to a 'dim-witted and muddle-headed ruler,' expressing deep sympathy.

description.zh-cn: 宁锦之战后，魏忠贤党羽以袁崇焕不救锦州为由进行弹劾，导致袁崇焕被迫请求辞官归乡。
description.en: After the Battle of Ningjin, allies of Wei Zhongxian impeached Yuan Chonghuan on the grounds of failing to relieve Jinzhou, forcing Yuan to request retirement from his post.

description.zh-cn: 在位期间，明熹宗采纳朝臣建议，提拔袁崇焕至兵部任职，并在宁远之战后多次予以升迁和嘉奖，支持其在辽东的军事活动。
description.en: During his reign, the Tianqi Emperor adopted the advice of his officials to promote Yuan Chonghuan to a position in the Ministry of War. Following the Battle of Ningyuan, he repeatedly promoted and rewarded Yuan, supporting his military activities in Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 自1896年起担任奥匈帝国皇储，直至1914年遇刺身亡。
description.en: Served as the Crown Prince of Austria-Hungary from 1896 until his assassination in 1914.

description.zh-cn: 萨拉热窝事件是第一次世界大战的导火线。
description.en: The Sarajevo incident was the catalyst for World War I.

description.zh-cn: 大久保利通对推动明治维新做出了巨大贡献。
description.en: Ōkubo Toshimichi made significant contributions to advancing the Meiji Restoration.

description.zh-cn: 在外交部翻译室工作期间，曾为邓小平等国家领导人担任翻译。
description.en: While working at the Department of Translation and Interpretation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, he served as an interpreter for state leaders such as Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 张维为在中共中央政治局第三十次集体学习上，就“加强中国国际传播能力建设”主题进行讲解。
description.en: Zhang Weiwei gave a lecture on 'strengthening China's international communication capabilities' at the 30th collective study session of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 因胡宗南身高不足，经时任军校党代表廖仲恺特许被录取。
description.en: Due to Hu Zongnan's insufficient height, he was admitted to the military academy with special permission from Liao Zhongkai, the party representative at the time.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南晚年曾感慨称周恩来是其“政治克星”。
description.en: In his later years, Hu Zongnan lamented that Zhou Enlai was his 'political nemesis'.

description.zh-cn: 介绍其学生叶霞翟与胡宗南相识，促成两人婚事。
description.en: Introduced his student Ye Xiazhai to Hu Zongnan, which led to their marriage.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战后期，胡宗南指挥的部队屡战失利，最终全军覆没。
description.en: In the later stages of the Second Chinese Civil War, the troops commanded by Hu Zongnan suffered repeated defeats and were eventually annihilated.

description.zh-cn: 1879年从普林斯顿大学毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Princeton University in 1879.

degree.zh-cn: 历史与政治科学哲学博士
degree.en: Ph.D. in History and Political Science

description.zh-cn: 1886年从约翰·霍普金斯大学获得历史与政治科学的哲学博士学位。
description.en: Received a Ph.D. in History and Political Science from Johns Hopkins University in 1886.

description.zh-cn: 担任普林斯顿大学第13任校长。
description.en: Served as the 13th President of Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊是民主党成员，并作为其候选人当选新泽西州州长和美国总统。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson was a member of the Democratic Party and was elected Governor of New Jersey and President of the United States as its candidate.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊于1917年4月2日请求国会宣战，将美国带入第一次世界大战。
description.en: Wilson asked Congress for a declaration of war on April 2, 1917, bringing the United States into World War I.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊总统于1913年签署了《联邦储备法案》，从而建立了联邦储备系统。
description.en: President Wilson signed the Federal Reserve Act in 1913, establishing the Federal Reserve System.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾拜儒家大师荀子为师。
description.en: Han Fei studied under the Confucian master Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 李斯曾拜儒家大师荀子为师。
description.en: Li Si studied under the Confucian master Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 韩非与李斯一同拜荀子为师，为同学关系。
description.en: Han Fei and Li Si studied under Xunzi together as fellow students.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政在读到韩非的著作后对其极为欣赏，感叹“寡人假如能够见到这个作者并与他往来，就死而无憾了”。
description.en: After reading Han Fei's works, King Zheng of Qin deeply admired him, remarking, 'If I could but meet this man and befriend him, I would die without regret.'

description.zh-cn: 韩非反对儒家建构在私人情感与社会道德提升上的治国主张。
description.en: Han Fei opposed the Confucian approach to governance, which was based on personal emotional bonds and the elevation of social morality.

description.zh-cn: 秦国以战争为要胁，逼迫韩国派韩非出使。
description.en: The state of Qin used the threat of war to compel the state of Han to send Han Fei as an envoy.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪于1997年至2002年任中共中央政治局候补委员，2002年至2007年任委员。
description.en: Wu Yi served as an alternate member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee from 1997 to 2002, and as a full member from 2002 to 2007.

description.zh-cn: 在SARS疫情期间，国家主席胡锦涛发布主席令，任命吴仪兼任卫生部部长。
description.en: During the SARS outbreak, President Hu Jintao issued a presidential decree appointing Wu Yi concurrently as Minister of Health.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任国务院总理的内阁中，吴仪出任国务院副总理。
description.en: In the cabinet where Wen Jiabao served as Premier of the State Council, Wu Yi was appointed Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 在朱镕基担任国务院总理期间，吴仪是国务委员。
description.en: While Zhu Rongji was Premier of the State Council, Wu Yi served as a State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，吴仪是中央政治局委员。
description.en: While Hu Jintao was General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Wu Yi was a member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任中共中央总书记期间，吴仪是中央政治局候补委员。
description.en: While Jiang Zemin was General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Wu Yi was an alternate member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 因小泉纯一郎等日本高官在二战历史问题上发出强硬表态，吴仪在访日期间断然决定取消与小泉的会面。
description.en: Due to strong statements from Japanese high officials including Junichiro Koizumi on WWII history issues, Wu Yi decisively canceled her meeting with Koizumi during her visit to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 2007年初，时任副总理的黄菊病重，吴仪全面接管了中国的经济和金融工作。
description.en: In early 2007, as then Vice Premier Huang Ju was critically ill, Wu Yi took full charge of China's economic and financial affairs.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪卸任排名第一的国务院副总理后，由李克强接任。
description.en: After Wu Yi stepped down as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council, she was succeeded by Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪接替李岚清，出任中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部部长。
description.en: Wu Yi succeeded Li Lanqing as the Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋认为使用空印文书是官员相互勾结的欺君重罪，对此大为震怒，下令严厉处罚所有相关官员，引发了空印案。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang became enraged, viewing the use of pre-sealed blank documents as a serious crime of deceiving the monarch and colluding among officials, and ordered severe punishment for all involved, thus initiating the Empty Seal Case.

description.zh-cn: 空印案中涉及的使用盖有印信的空白书册的做法，是从元朝沿袭而来的习惯，这为案件的发生埋下了伏笔。
description.en: The practice of using pre-sealed blank books, which was at the center of the Empty Seal Case, was a custom inherited from the Yuan Dynasty, setting the stage for the incident.

description.zh-cn: “批邓、反击右倾翻案风”是文化大革命末期的最后一次大规模政治运动，是文革政治路线的延续。
description.en: 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' was the last large-scale political movement of the late Cultural Revolution, a continuation of its political line.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮是该运动的主要推动者，积极批判邓小平并试图借机夺取更多权力。
description.en: The Gang of Four were the main promoters of this movement, actively criticizing Deng Xiaoping and attempting to seize more power.

description.zh-cn: 四五运动被官方定性为“反革命事件”，并被归罪于邓小平，成为撤销其一切职务的直接借口，使“批邓”运动升级。
description.en: The Tiananmen Incident was officially labeled a 'counter-revolutionary incident' and blamed on Deng Xiaoping, serving as a direct pretext for his dismissal from all posts and escalating the 'Criticize Deng' movement.

description.zh-cn: 在粉碎“四人帮”后，华国锋基于“两个凡是”的需要，继续推进“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动，并拒绝为邓小平平反。
description.en: After smashing the Gang of Four, Hua Guofeng, based on the need for the 'Two Whatevers,' continued to advance the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' movement and refused to rehabilitate Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 在柬埔寨、缅甸、泰国等东南亚国家，随着佛教的传入，种姓制度式微并逐渐凋零。
description.en: In Southeast Asian countries such as Cambodia, Myanmar, and Thailand, the caste system declined and gradually disappeared with the introduction of Buddhism.

position.zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组副组长
position.en: Deputy Leader of the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform

description.zh-cn: 在中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组中，许其亮担任副组长，是组长习近平的下属。
description.en: In the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform, Xu Qiliang served as a deputy leader, subordinate to the leader Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组副组长
position.en: Deputy Leader of the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform

description.zh-cn: 在中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组中，范长龙担任副组长，是组长习近平的下属。
description.en: In the CMC Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform, Fan Changlong served as a deputy leader, subordinate to the leader Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 改革中成立了陆军领导机构，改变了以往陆军由四总部代为管理的情况，标志着大陆军主义的终结。
description.en: The reform established a leading organ for the Ground Force, changing the previous situation where the army was managed by the four general headquarters, and marking the end of 'army-centrism'.

description.zh-cn: 作为震中所在国，印度尼西亚是此次灾难中伤亡最惨重、损失最大的国家，特别是亚齐省遭到了毁灭性打击。
description.en: As the country where the epicenter was located, Indonesia suffered the most casualties and greatest losses in the disaster, with Aceh province being particularly devastated.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的海啸重创了印度东南部沿海地区及安达曼和尼科巴群岛，造成超过1万人罹难。
description.en: The tsunami triggered by the earthquake severely impacted India's southeastern coastal regions and the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, causing over 10,000 deaths.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的海啸对泰国南部的普吉岛等旅游胜地造成了严重破坏，导致超过5000人罹难，其中约一半为外国游客。
description.en: The tsunami triggered by the earthquake caused severe damage to tourist destinations in southern Thailand, such as Phuket, resulting in over 5,000 deaths, about half of whom were foreign tourists.

description.zh-cn: 作为政府武装力量的一部分，中国人民武装警察部队被出动以武力镇压骚乱。
description.en: As part of the government's armed forces, the People's Armed Police were deployed to suppress the unrest by force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军部队被出动以武力平息冲突。
description.en: People's Liberation Army troops were deployed to quell the conflict by force.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共西藏自治区党委书记，胡锦涛是镇压拉萨骚乱的主要决策者和指挥者之一。
description.en: As the Party Secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region, Hu Jintao was one of the key decision-makers and commanders in the suppression of the Lhasa unrest.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛向中共中央政治局常委会汇报了西藏的情况，后者据此形成了指导西藏工作的意见。
description.en: Hu Jintao reported on the situation in Tibet to the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, which then formulated guiding opinions for work in Tibet based on his report.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，中国工农红军主力部队改编为国民革命军第十八集团军（通称八路军）。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army were reorganized into the 18th Group Army (commonly known as the Eighth Route Army) of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 在长沙与周恩来共同审定并最终确定了被称为“长沙决策”的人事安排方案。
description.en: Jointly reviewed and finalized the personnel arrangement plan known as the 'Changsha Decision' with Zhou Enlai in Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 前往长沙向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况，并共同确定了“长沙决策”。
description.en: Traveled to Changsha to report to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th National People's Congress and jointly finalized the 'Changsha Decision'.

description.zh-cn: 在王洪文告状后，批评了王洪文。
description.en: Criticized Wang Hongwen after Wang made accusations.

description.zh-cn: 致信江青，告诫其“不要多露面，不要批文件，不要由你组阁（当后台老板）”。
description.en: Sent a letter to Jiang Qing, warning her 'not to make too many public appearances, not to approve documents, and not to form a cabinet (be the boss behind the scenes)'.

description.zh-cn: 1974年12月23日，周恩来向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况。12月26日晚，两人单独长谈，最终确定了“长沙决策”。
description.en: On December 23, 1974, Zhou Enlai reported to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th NPC. On the evening of December 26, the two had a long private talk and finalized the 'Changsha Decision'.

description.zh-cn: 1974年10月，王洪文前往长沙向毛泽东告状。12月23日，与周恩来一同向毛泽东汇报工作。
description.en: In October 1974, Wang Hongwen went to Changsha to complain to Mao Zedong. On December 23, he, along with Zhou Enlai, reported to Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 与王洪文一同前往长沙向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况。
description.en: Traveled to Changsha together with Wang Hongwen to report to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福与温斯顿·丘吉尔在开罗会议期间举行会谈。
description.en: Franklin D. Roosevelt held talks with Winston Churchill during the Cairo Conference.

description.zh-cn: 《开罗宣言》声明盟国将坚持对日作战直至其无条件投降，并要求日本归还其所窃取的一切领土。
description.en: The Cairo Declaration stated that the Allied powers would persevere in the war against Japan until its unconditional surrender and demanded that Japan return all territories it had stolen.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔对宣言草案文字作了进一步修改，将“特别是”改为“例如”，并加上了“澎湖”。
description.en: Winston Churchill made further textual modifications to the draft declaration, changing "in particular" to "for example" and adding "the Pescadores."

description.zh-cn: 在德黑兰会议上，约瑟夫·斯大林表示“完全”赞成《开罗宣言》及其全部内容。
description.en: At the Tehran Conference, Joseph Stalin expressed his "full" approval of the Cairo Declaration and "all its contents."

description.zh-cn: 在开罗会议结束后，罗斯福前往德黑兰与斯大林举行德黑兰会议。
description.en: After the Cairo Conference, Roosevelt traveled to Tehran to hold the Tehran Conference with Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 在开罗会议结束后，丘吉尔前往德黑兰与斯大林举行德黑兰会议。
description.en: After the Cairo Conference, Churchill traveled to Tehran to hold the Tehran Conference with Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 《波茨坦公告》第八条明确规定“《开罗宣言》之条件必将实施”。
description.en: Article 8 of the Potsdam Declaration explicitly states that "The terms of the Cairo Declaration shall be carried out."

description.zh-cn: 时任保安局局长李家超于2019年3月29日正式引入《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》。
description.en: Then-Secretary for Security John Lee officially introduced the 'Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill 2019' on March 29, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月23日，保安局局长李家超在立法会大会上正式宣布撤回修例。
description.en: On October 23, 2019, Secretary for Security John Lee formally announced the withdrawal of the bill amendment in the Legislative Council meeting.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟向香港政府发出外交照会，抗议修订《逃犯条例》。
description.en: The European Union issued a diplomatic démarche to the Hong Kong government to protest the amendment of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance.

description.zh-cn: 纪念堂北门西侧的群像雕塑中，包含了表现无产阶级文化大革命的内容，反映了官方对这一历史时期的叙事。
description.en: The group sculpture on the west side of the North Gate of the memorial hall includes content depicting the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution, reflecting the official narrative of this historical period.

description.zh-cn: 将庆王府（后来的恭王府）赐予恭亲王奕䜣。
description.en: Bestowed Prince Qing's Mansion (later Prince Gong's Mansion) upon Prince Gong, Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 作为府邸主人入住，府邸从此得名“恭王府”。
description.en: Moved in as the master of the mansion, and it has since been named "Prince Gong's Mansion."

description.zh-cn: 1985年7月1日，国防部特种情报室与国防部情报局合并，成立国防部军事情报局。
description.en: On July 1, 1985, the Special Intelligence Office merged with the Intelligence Bureau to form the Military Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 民主派对中国人权状况常有所批判，并以“结束一党专政”和“平反六四”作为其核心诉求之一。六四事件后，民主派与中共关系决裂。
description.en: The pro-democracy camp is often critical of the human rights situation in China and holds 'ending one-party rule' and 'vindicating the June 4th incident' as its core demands. After the June 4th incident, the relationship between the pro-democracy camp and the CCP broke down.

description.zh-cn: 在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论。
在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论，习近平还在报告上作了批注。
在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论。
因呼吸道感染请假，缺席全国人大会议闭幕日会议。
因赵乐际请假缺席，代为主持闭幕会。
在缺席人大会议闭幕式次日，赵乐际与李鸿忠一同公开活动，看望参与“两会”报道的新闻工作者。
在缺席人大会议闭幕式次日，赵乐际与李书磊一同公开活动，看望参与“两会”报道的新闻工作者。
南非于1998年1月1日与中华人民共和国建立外交关系。
description.en: South Africa established diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China on January 1, 1998.

description.zh-cn: 在孙中山逝世后，汪精卫于1925年7月1日将原中华民国陆海军大元帅大本营改组为国民政府。
description.en: After the death of Sun Yat-sen, Wang Jingwei reorganized the former Generalissimo's Headquarters into the Nationalist Government on July 1, 1925.

description.zh-cn: 从1925年成立到1928年北伐胜利前，广州国民政府与北京的北洋政府处于对峙状态。
description.en: From its establishment in 1925 until the victory of the Northern Expedition in 1928, the Guangzhou Nationalist Government was in a state of confrontation with the Beiyang Government in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 张学良宣布东北易帜，名义上接受国民政府领导。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang announced the Northeast Flag Replacement, nominally accepting the leadership of the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中，阎锡山联合其他军阀反对蒋中正领导的南京国民政府。
description.en: During the Central Plains War, Yan Xishan allied with other warlords against the Nanjing Nationalist Government led by Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中，冯玉祥联合其他军阀反对蒋中正领导的南京国民政府。
description.en: During the Central Plains War, Feng Yuxiang allied with other warlords against the Nanjing Nationalist Government led by Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中，李宗仁联合其他军阀反对蒋中正领导的南京国民政府。
description.en: During the Central Plains War, Li Zongren allied with other warlords against the Nanjing Nationalist Government led by Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中原大战期间成立的北平国民政府与南京国民政府处于对立状态。
description.en: The Beiping Nationalist Government, established during the Central Plains War, was in opposition to the Nanjing Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党建立的中华苏维埃共和国与国民政府处于武装对抗状态。
description.en: The Chinese Soviet Republic, established by the Chinese Communist Party, was in a state of armed conflict with the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 随着日军逼近南京，中国抗日战争的爆发迫使国民政府将首都迁往重庆。
description.en: As the Japanese army advanced on Nanjing, the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War forced the Nationalist Government to move its capital to Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫政权是在日本军队的扶植下成立的。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime was established under the support of the Japanese military.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争随着第二次世界大战的结束而结束。
description.en: The Second Sino-Japanese War ended with the conclusion of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府决定将京都更名为北平，并设立北平特别市，直隶国民政府。
description.en: The Nationalist Government decided to rename the capital Kyoto to Peiping and established the Peiping Special Municipality, directly under its jurisdiction.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行由中国人民银行的工商信贷和储蓄业务分离而设立。
description.en: ICBC was established by separating the industrial and commercial credit and savings business from the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院于1983年9月决定分拆中国人民银行的相关业务，成立一家新银行，即后来的中国工商银行。
description.en: In September 1983, the State Council of the People's Republic of China decided to spin off relevant businesses from the People's Bank of China to establish a new bank, which became ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙警方以“涉及洗黑钱及税务欺诈”为名，突击搜查中国工商银行马德里分行，并拘捕5名银行管理层人员。
description.en: Spanish police raided the ICBC Madrid branch on suspicion of money laundering and tax fraud, arresting five members of the bank's management.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国作为轴心国的主要成员之一，是第二次世界大战在亚太战场的主要侵略方。
description.en: The Empire of Japan, as one of the main members of the Axis powers, was the primary aggressor in the Asia-Pacific theater of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 美国在广岛和长崎投下原子弹，最终迫使大日本帝国投降。
description.en: The United States dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, ultimately forcing the Empire of Japan to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇通过广播宣布日本无条件投降，标志着第二次世界大战的结束。
description.en: Emperor Shōwa announced Japan's unconditional surrender via radio broadcast, marking the end of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 德川家康于1603年开创江户幕府。
description.en: Tokugawa Ieyasu founded the Edo shogunate in 1603.

description.zh-cn: 耶稣是基督宗教的创始人，该宗教于公元一世纪由他创立。
description.en: Jesus is the founder of Christianity, which he established in the first century AD.

description.zh-cn: 宗教改革运动公开反对罗马教宗的权力，并批判天主教会的教义，削弱了其权威。
description.en: The Protestant Reformation openly opposed the authority of the Roman Pope and criticized the doctrines of the Catholic Church, weakening its authority.

description.zh-cn: 以中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会主席名义签署命令，将东北边防军改名为“中国人民志愿军”，并决定其入朝作战。
description.en: As Chairman of the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government, he signed the order to rename the Northeast Border Defense Army to the 'Chinese People's Volunteer Army' and decided on its entry into the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 志愿军入朝至停战期间，其武装力量领导职能由中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会承担。
description.en: From its entry into Korea until the armistice, the leadership functions for the Volunteer Army were undertaken by the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 于1950年10月19日跨过鸭绿江进入朝鲜参战，迅速击退联合国军，深刻影响了战争的进程和最终结局。
description.en: Crossed the Yalu River to enter the war in Korea on October 19, 1950, quickly pushing back the UN forces and profoundly influencing the course and outcome of the war.

description.zh-cn: 作为盟友在朝鲜战争中并肩作战。
description.en: Fought alongside each other as allies in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 在军委会议上，将“支援军”改为“边防军”，并提出参战部队使用“志愿军”服装和旗帜，影响了部队的最终名称和形象。
description.en: At a Military Commission meeting, changed 'Support Army' to 'Border Defense Army' and proposed that combat troops use 'Volunteer Army' uniforms and flags, influencing the force's final name and image.

description.zh-cn: 同意了周恩来提出的苏联方面提供空军掩护和负责中国主要城市领空安全的要求，为志愿军出兵提供了重要支持。
description.en: Agreed to Zhou Enlai's request for Soviet air cover and responsibility for the air defense of major Chinese cities, providing crucial support for the Volunteer Army's deployment.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，命令召回驻板门店军事停战委员会的中国人民志愿军代表团，结束了其在朝鲜半岛的官方使命。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central Military Commission, he ordered the recall of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army delegation from the Military Armistice Commission in Panmunjom, ending its official mission on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 为志愿军提供了绝大多数主战装备，如T-34坦克、米格-15战斗机等，并在1951年3月后帮助其逐步换装苏式武器。
description.en: Provided the vast majority of main combat equipment to the Volunteer Army, such as T-34 tanks and MiG-15 fighters, and helped it gradually re-equip with Soviet-made weapons after March 1951.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军是中华人民共和国派出的赴朝作战部队。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was the expeditionary force dispatched by the People's Republic of China to fight in Korea.

description.zh-cn: 731部队是关东军下属的防疫给水部本部。
description.en: Unit 731 was the headquarters of the Epidemic Prevention and Water Purification Department under the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 关东军是大日本帝国陆军的一支主要部队。
description.en: The Kwantung Army was a major army group of the Imperial Japanese Army.

description.zh-cn: 京都帝国大学向731部队派出了多名医学专家，协助石井四郎进行研究。
description.en: Kyoto Imperial University sent numerous medical experts to Unit 731 to assist Shirō Ishii with his research.

description.zh-cn: 东京帝国大学向731部队派出了至少六名医学专家。
description.en: Tokyo Imperial University sent at least six medical experts to Unit 731.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军领导机关与中原军区领导机关合并，组成第四野战军兼华中军区（后改称中南军区）领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Fourth Field Army merged with that of the Central Plains Military Region to form the leading organ of the Fourth Field Army and the Central China Military Region (later renamed the Central South Military Region).

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四野战军是中国人民解放军的主力部队之一。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army was one of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军是第二次国共内战时期中国人民解放军的主力部队。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army was a main force of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战中，第四野战军及其前身部队与国民政府领导的国军作战。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, the Fourth Field Army and its predecessor units fought against the National Revolutionary Army led by the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军配合第二、第三野战军发起渡江战役。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army coordinated with the Second and Third Field Armies to launch the Yangtze River Crossing Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军在衡阳、宝庆及阳江、阳春地区击败白崇禧部主力。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army defeated the main forces of Bai Chongxi in the Hengyang, Baoqing, and Yangjiang, Yangchun areas.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军将第164师和第156师的朝鲜族士兵转移编入朝鲜人民军。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army transferred Korean soldiers from the 164th and 156th Divisions to the Korean People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 赵国最终为秦国所灭。
description.en: The State of Zhao was ultimately conquered by the State of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 前228年，秦将王翦攻破赵都邯郸，俘虏赵王迁，赵国灭亡。
description.en: In 228 BCE, the Qin general Wang Jian captured Handan, the capital of Zhao, and took King Qian captive, leading to the fall of the State of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 1954年全国人民代表大会建立后，中国人民政治协商会议的立法职能让渡予全国人大。
description.en: After the establishment of the National People's Congress in 1954, the legislative function of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference was transferred to the NPC.

description.zh-cn: 反右运动使民主党派此后参政议政受到相当程度的限制。
description.en: The Anti-Rightist Campaign significantly restricted the political participation and deliberation of the democratic parties thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月30日，全国政协机关因文化大革命停止办公。
description.en: On August 30, 1966, the offices of the CPPCC National Committee ceased operations due to the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1973年2月28日，经周恩来批准，全国政协举行活动，标志着其开始恢复活动。
description.en: On February 28, 1973, with Zhou Enlai's approval, the CPPCC National Committee held an event, marking the beginning of its resumption of activities.

description.zh-cn: 全国政协会议与全国人大会议并称为“全国两会”。
description.en: The CPPCC National Committee meeting and the NPC meeting are collectively known as the 'National Two Sessions'.

description.zh-cn: 全国人大会议与全国政协会议并称为“全国两会”。
description.en: The NPC meeting and the CPPCC National Committee meeting are collectively known as the 'National Two Sessions'.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟是任正非的女儿。
description.en: Meng Wanzhou is the daughter of Ren Zhengfei.

description.zh-cn: 日本于1945年8月15日宣布无条件投降，并于9月2日正式签署降伏文书，结束了太平洋战争。
description.en: Japan announced its unconditional surrender on August 15, 1945, and formally signed the Instrument of Surrender on September 2, ending the Pacific War.

description.zh-cn: 在珍珠港事件后，美国对日宣战，成为同盟国的主要成员。
description.en: After the attack on Pearl Harbor, the United States declared war on Japan and became a major member of the Allies.

description.zh-cn: 通过广播发布《终战诏书》，向日本民众宣布接受《波茨坦公告》，决定投降。
description.en: Broadcast the Jewel Voice Broadcast, announcing to the Japanese people the acceptance of the Potsdam Declaration and the decision to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 《终战诏书》的发布标志着日本决定无条件投降。
description.en: The broadcast of the Imperial Rescript on the Termination of the War signaled Japan's decision to surrender unconditionally.

description.zh-cn: 在珍珠港事件后领导美国对日宣战，是同盟国在太平洋战争期间的主要领导人之一。
description.en: Led the United States to declare war on Japan after the attack on Pearl Harbor and was one of the principal Allied leaders during the Pacific War.

description.zh-cn: 在中共八届十中全会上，毛泽东念了康生递上的“利用小说进行反党，是一大发明”的纸条并加以评论，为该案的成立提供了最高层的支持。
description.en: At the Tenth Plenary Session of the Eighth CCP Central Committee, Mao Zedong read and commented on a note from Kang Sheng stating 'using novels to carry out anti-Party activities is a great invention', providing top-level support for the case.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的开始使得《刘志丹》案的受害者遭到更严酷的迫害，案件进一步升级为“西北反党集团”。
description.en: The beginning of the Cultural Revolution led to more severe persecution of the victims of the 'Liu Zhidan' case, which was further escalated into the 'Northwest Anti-Party Group'.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央组织部于1979年向中央递交报告，建议为小说《刘志丹》案平反。
description.en: In 1979, the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee submitted a report to the Central Committee, recommending the rehabilitation of the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央于1979年8月下发文件，为小说《刘志丹》一案彻底平反。
description.en: In August 1979, the CCP Central Committee issued a document to completely rehabilitate the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case.

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，北越（越南民主共和国）与南越（越南共和国）处于敌对状态。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam) and South Vietnam (Republic of Vietnam) were in a state of hostility.

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，苏联向北越（越南民主共和国）提供军事和经济援助。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the Soviet Union provided military and economic aid to North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，中华人民共和国向北越（越南民主共和国）提供支援。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the People's Republic of China provided support to North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，美国向南越（越南共和国）提供主要支援。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the United States was the primary supporter of South Vietnam (Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 1982年入读北京大学，后被保送至该校遥感技术应用研究所。
description.en: Enrolled in Peking University in 1982 and was later admitted to its Institute of Remote Sensing and GIS Application.

description.zh-cn: 作为学生领袖，担任北高联主席等多个领导职务，是运动的主要组织者和领导者之一。
description.en: As a student leader, he served as the chairman of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation and held several other leadership positions, making him one of the main organizers and leaders of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，封从德被北京市公安局通缉，在中国大陆逃亡十个月后流亡海外。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests, Feng Congde was put on the wanted list by the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau, and he went into exile after being a fugitive in mainland China for ten months.

description.zh-cn: 作为八九民运学生领袖，遭中共当局通缉并流亡海外。其言论主张中共崩溃。
description.en: As a student leader of the 1989 democracy movement, he was wanted by the CCP authorities and went into exile. His statements advocate for the collapse of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 国防部陆军司令部及其所属部队得编配参谋本部，负责执行军队指挥。
在黄安战役中，秦基伟率部护卫徐向前指挥夺回阵地。
description.en: During the Huang'an Campaign, Qin Jiwei led his troops to protect Xu Xiangqian while he commanded the recapture of the position.

description.zh-cn: 秦基伟任司令员的第九纵队隶属于陈赓、谢富治指挥的“陈谢集团”。
description.en: The 9th Column, commanded by Qin Jiwei, was subordinate to the 'Chen-Xie Group' led by Chen Geng and Xie Fuzhi.

description.zh-cn: 指挥中国人民志愿军第15军参加上甘岭战役，坚守40余天。
description.en: Commanded the 15th Army of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army in the Battle of Triangle Hill, holding the position for over 40 days.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间被批斗，并被下放至农场劳改，后于1973年恢复工作。
description.en: Was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution, sent to a farm for re-education through labor, and reinstated in 1973.

description.zh-cn: 在中华人民共和国成立35周年阅兵式上担任总指挥，陪同邓小平检阅部队。
description.en: Served as the general commander of the military parade for the 35th anniversary of the PRC, accompanying Deng Xiaoping to inspect the troops.

description.zh-cn: 接替张爱萍出任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: Succeeded Zhang Aiping as the Minister of National Defense of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 秦基伟卸任国防部长后，由迟浩田接任。
description.en: After Qin Jiwei stepped down as Minister of Defense, Chi Haotian succeeded him.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利于1986年3月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Meng Fanli joined the Communist Party of China in March 1986.

description.zh-cn: 在南开大学会计系西方会计专业在职攻读硕士研究生。
description.en: Pursued a master's degree in Western accounting in the Department of Accounting at Nankai University while working.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利任广东省省长时，黄坤明任中共广东省委书记，是其直接上级。
description.en: When Meng Fanli was Governor of Guangdong, Huang Kunming was the Party Secretary of Guangdong, his direct superior.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利接替王伟中担任广东省省长及深圳市委书记职务。
description.en: Meng Fanli succeeded Wang Weizhong as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 王浩接替孟凡利担任中共烟台市委书记。
description.en: Wang Hao succeeded Meng Fanli as Party Secretary of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 在孟凡利就任深圳市委书记的领导干部会议上，时任广东省委书记李希出席并讲话。
description.en: At the leadership cadre meeting for Meng Fanli's appointment as Shenzhen Party Secretary, Li Xi, then Party Secretary of Guangdong, attended and spoke.

description.zh-cn: 中央政治局在中央委员会全体会议闭会期间，行使中央委员会的职权。
description.en: The Political Bureau exercises the functions and powers of the Central Committee when the latter is not in session.

description.zh-cn: 李先念接替刘少奇（至1968年）担任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Li Xiannian succeeded Liu Shaoqi (until 1968) as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李先念的国家主席职务由杨尚昆接替。
description.en: Li Xiannian was succeeded by Yang Shangkun as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李先念的全国政协主席职务由李瑞环接替。
description.en: Li Xiannian was succeeded by Li Ruihuan as Chairman of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 李先念被认为是邓小平主政时期的“中共八大元老”之一。
description.en: Li Xiannian is considered one of the 'Eight Elders of the CCP' during Deng Xiaoping's era.

description.zh-cn: 在“六四天安门事件”中，李先念公开表态支持中央决定，支持武力镇压。
description.en: During the 'Tiananmen Square Incident', Li Xiannian publicly expressed support for the central government's decision and supported the use of force.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘拒绝执行中共中央的北上方针，率领红四方面军（包括李先念部）南下。
description.en: Zhang Guotao refused to follow the CPC Central Committee's northward policy, leading the Fourth Front Army (including Li Xiannian's troops) southward.

description.zh-cn: 1945年1月，李先念率领的新四军第5师与王震的八路军南下支队会师。同年10月，共同组建中原军区。
description.en: In January 1945, the New Fourth Army's 5th Division led by Li Xiannian met with Wang Zhen's southward detachment of the Eighth Route Army. In October of the same year, they jointly established the Central Plains Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 李先念与邓小平在革命战争时期及建国后长期共事，在文革后期协助邓小平进行全面整顿。
description.en: Li Xiannian and Deng Xiaoping worked together for a long time during the revolutionary wars and after the founding of the PRC. In the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, he assisted Deng Xiaoping in the comprehensive rectification.

description.zh-cn: 1948年，李先念与邓子恢在开封参与领导淮海战役的后勤保障工作。
description.en: In 1948, Li Xiannian and Deng Zihui co-led the logistical support for the Huaihai Campaign in Kaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 1968年，李先念在文化大革命期间被下放到北京市北郊木材厂劳动。
description.en: In 1968, during the Cultural Revolution, Li Xiannian was sent to perform manual labor at a timber factory in the northern suburbs of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 李先念因被指为“二月逆流”成员而受到批判。
description.en: Li Xiannian was criticized for being identified as a member of the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 在“二月逆流”后，江青称李先念为“附和错误路线”，使其受到批判。
description.en: After the 'February Countercurrent', Jiang Qing labeled Li Xiannian as 'adhering to an erroneous line', leading to his criticism.

description.zh-cn: 以“教会的保护者”名义出兵保护罗马，阻止意大利王国占领，直到普法战争爆发。
description.en: He sent troops to protect Rome under the title 'protector of the Church', preventing its occupation by the Kingdom of Italy until the Franco-Prussian War.

description.zh-cn: 1940年10月24日，贝当与希特勒在卢瓦河畔蒙图瓦尔会面，商讨两国间的合作事宜。
description.en: On October 24, 1940, Pétain met with Hitler at Montoire-sur-le-Loir to discuss collaboration between their two countries.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统委任艾森豪威尔为美国陆军参谋长。
description.en: President Truman appointed Eisenhower as Chief of Staff of the United States Army.

description.zh-cn: 担任首位北大西洋公约组织最高指挥官。
description.en: Served as the first Supreme Commander of NATO.

description.zh-cn: 在艾森豪威尔担任总统期间任其副总统。
description.en: Served as Vice President during Eisenhower's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 在古巴导弹危机期间，应时任总统肯尼迪的请求，与其会谈商讨应对方案。
description.en: During the Cuban Missile Crisis, at the request of then-President Kennedy, he met with him to discuss response strategies.

description.zh-cn: 在总统任内推行冷战政策，以遏制苏联共产主义的扩张。
description.en: During his presidency, he implemented Cold War policies to contain the expansion of Soviet communism.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次朝核危机期间，金泳三与美国总统比尔·克林顿协调，成功劝阻了美国对朝鲜宁边核设施的军事打击计划。
description.en: During the First North Korean nuclear crisis, Kim Young-sam coordinated with U.S. President Bill Clinton and successfully dissuaded the U.S. from its plan to conduct a military strike on North Korea's Yongbyon nuclear facilities.

description.zh-cn: 机场建设因朝鲜战争爆发而搁置。
description.en: The construction of the airport was postponed due to the outbreak of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 在苏联专家的指导下开始规划设计。
description.en: Planning and design began under the guidance of Soviet experts.

description.zh-cn: 先后批准了首都机场2号航站楼扩建工程的可行性研究报告（1992年）和3号航站楼建设方案（2003年）。
description.en: Successively approved the feasibility study report for the Terminal 2 expansion project (1992) and the construction plan for Terminal 3 (2003).

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温家宝的儿子。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the son of Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温如春的哥哥。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the brother of Wen Ruchun.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Wen Jiabao served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 因温云松身份敏感为由，拒绝其求职申请。
description.en: Rejected his job application due to his sensitive background.

description.zh-cn: 何晶曾主掌淡马锡控股。
description.en: Ho Ching formerly headed Temasek Holdings.

description.zh-cn: 何晶是新加坡总理李显龙的夫人。
description.en: Ho Ching is the wife of Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 据博讯新闻称，媒体对温云松的负面报道与当时温家宝和江泽民派系（上海帮）的政治权力斗争有关。
description.en: According to Boxun News, negative media reports about Wen Yunsong were related to the political power struggle between Wen Jiabao and the Jiang Zemin faction (Shanghai clique) at the time.

description.zh-cn: 由于防火长城的审查机制，“温云松”成为网络搜索敏感词，导致其信息在百度、搜狗、新浪微博等平台被封锁或限制。
description.en: Due to the Great Firewall's censorship mechanism, 'Wen Yunsong' became a sensitive search term, leading to the blocking or restriction of his information on platforms like Baidu, Sogou, and Sina Weibo.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉曾受雇于江户幕府，从事政府公文的翻译工作，并随幕府使节团出访海外。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi was employed by the Edo Shogunate to translate government documents and accompanied its missions abroad.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉通过其教育和著述活动，极大地影响和推动了明治维新运动，传播西方思想，倡导“文明开化”。
description.en: Through his educational and literary activities, Fukuzawa Yukichi greatly influenced and promoted the Meiji Restoration by disseminating Western ideas and advocating for 'Civilization and Enlightenment'.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉在其《脱亚论》中对清朝持蔑视态度，视其为“恶友”，主张与其绝交。
description.en: In his 'Datsu-A Ron', Fukuzawa Yukichi held a contemptuous attitude towards the Qing dynasty, regarding it as a 'bad friend' and advocating for breaking ties.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉在其《脱亚论》中对朝鲜王朝持蔑视态度，视其为“恶友”，主张与其绝交。
description.en: In his 'Datsu-A Ron', Fukuzawa Yukichi held a contemptuous attitude towards the Joseon dynasty, regarding it as a 'bad friend' and advocating for breaking ties.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉将中日甲午战争描述为一场“文野之战”，并支持日本对华开战。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi described the First Sino-Japanese War as a 'war between civilization and barbarism' and supported Japan's decision to go to war with China.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉在《劝学篇》中多次提及亚当斯密的自由市场经济论，其经济思想受到其影响。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi repeatedly mentioned Adam Smith's free-market economic theory in 'An Encouragement of Learning', indicating his economic thought was influenced by it.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉1860年访问美国，这次经历让他受到文化震撼，并深刻认识到学习英语和西方制度的必要性。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi's visit to the United States in 1860 caused him culture shock and made him profoundly aware of the necessity of learning English and Western systems.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是共产国际的创始人之一。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 俄国十月革命的成功，为第三国际的成立提供了政治基础和号召力。
description.en: The success of the October Revolution in Russia provided the political basis and appeal for the establishment of the Third International.

description.zh-cn: 为在反法西斯战争中拉拢英美等国，苏联主导解散了以反对资本主义国家为目的的共产国际。
description.en: In order to win over countries like the United Kingdom and the United States in the anti-fascist war, the Soviet Union led the dissolution of the Comintern, which was originally established to oppose capitalist countries.

description.zh-cn: 作为苏联的最高领导人，约瑟夫·斯大林对共产国际的活动及决议拥有重大影响力。
description.en: As the supreme leader of the Soviet Union, Joseph Stalin held significant influence over the activities and resolutions of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 解散共产国际是苏联为在第二次世界大战中拉拢美国作为盟友而采取的妥协举动。
description.en: The dissolution of the Comintern was a compromise made by the Soviet Union to win over the United States as an ally in World War II.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培曾两度担任北京大学校长，期间革新北大，开“学术”与“自由”之风，大量引进新人物，使北大成为新文化运动的中心。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei served as the President of Peking University twice, during which he reformed the university, fostering a spirit of 'academics' and 'freedom'. He brought in many new figures, making Peking University the center of the New Culture Movement.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，蔡元培在主持教育行政委员会期间，筹设并创办了中央研究院。
description.en: In 1927, while presiding over the Education Administrative Committee, Cai Yuanpei planned and founded the Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培担任中央研究院首任院长直至去世。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei served as the first President of Academia Sinica until his death.

description.zh-cn: 在1927年，蔡元培积极主张并参与了针对中国共产党的“清党”行动。
description.en: In 1927, Cai Yuanpei actively advocated for and participated in the 'Party purge' targeting the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括毛泽东。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括周恩来。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括陈独秀。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Chen Duxiu.

description.zh-cn: 1905年加入同盟会，并被孙中山委任为上海分会负责人。
description.en: Joined the Tongmenghui in 1905 and was appointed by Sun Yat-sen as the head of its Shanghai branch.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培因不满袁世凯的专制统治，于1912年7月辞去教育总长职务。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei resigned from his post as Minister of Education in July 1912 due to his dissatisfaction with Yuan Shikai's autocratic rule.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在蔡元培逝世后发出唁电，称其为“学界泰斗，人世楷模”，高度评价并巩固其历史地位。
description.en: After Cai Yuanpei's death, Mao Zedong sent a condolence telegram praising him as a 'titan of the academic world and a model for all,' highly evaluating and solidifying his historical status.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国共产党最高领导人，毛泽东主导了土地改革运动，并坚持以阶级斗争的激烈方式进行。
description.en: As the supreme leader of the Communist Party of China, Mao Zedong led the Land Reform Movement and insisted on carrying it out through intense class struggle.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党作为执政党，在全国范围内发起并领导了土地改革运动。
description.en: As the ruling party, the Communist Party of China initiated and led the Land Reform Movement nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国建国后的土地改革运动是第二次国共内战期间中共在“解放区”所实行土地改革的延续，内战期间的经验为全国性运动奠定了基础。
description.en: The post-1949 Land Reform Movement was a continuation of the land reforms implemented by the CCP in 'liberated areas' during the Second Chinese Civil War; experiences from the war period laid the foundation for the nationwide movement.

description.zh-cn: 该法律的颁布为1950年后在全国范围内进行的土地改革运动提供了法律依据和具体指导。
description.en: The promulgation of this law provided the legal basis and specific guidance for the Land Reform Movement conducted nationwide after 1950.

description.zh-cn: 因不满广东土改进展缓慢，毛泽东于1951年11月后将陶铸调往广东主管土改工作，以加强和加速运动。
description.en: Dissatisfied with the slow progress of land reform in Guangdong, Mao Zedong transferred Tao Zhu after November 1951 to take charge of the work there to strengthen and accelerate the movement.

description.zh-cn: 因不满广东土改进展缓慢，毛泽东于1951年11月后将赵紫阳与陶铸一同调往广东参与领导土改工作。
description.en: Dissatisfied with the slow progress of land reform in Guangdong, Mao Zedong transferred Zhao Ziyang along with Tao Zhu after November 1951 to participate in leading the land reform work.

description.zh-cn: 1948年1月，任弼时发表《土地改革中的几个问题》，纠正了当时土改运动中出现的“左”倾偏向。
description.en: In January 1948, Ren Bishi published 'Several Issues in Land Reform', correcting the 'leftist' deviations that had emerged in the land reform movement at the time.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命太原起义成功后，阎锡山被推举为山西都督。
description.en: After the success of the Taiyuan Uprising during the Xinhai Revolution, Yan Xishan was elected as the military governor of Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯曾派兵进攻山西，阻挠阎锡山回太原。
description.en: Yuan Shikai once sent troops to attack Shanxi and obstruct Yan Xishan's return to Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中与冯玉祥结盟，共同反对蒋介石。
description.en: Allied with Feng Yuxiang during the Central Plains War to jointly oppose Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中与李宗仁结盟，共同反对蒋介石。
description.en: Allied with Li Zongren during the Central Plains War to jointly oppose Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 张学良通电支持蒋介石，并派兵入关，导致阎锡山在中原大战中失败。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang declared his support for Chiang Kai-shek and sent troops into the Shanhai Pass, leading to Yan Xishan's defeat in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，阎锡山作为国民党将领与中国人民解放军作战。
description.en: During the second Chinese Civil War, Yan Xishan, as a KMT general, fought against the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔接替内维尔·张伯伦出任英国首相。
description.en: Winston Churchill succeeded Neville Chamberlain as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 辞去首相后，内维尔·张伯伦在丘吉尔的战时内阁中担任枢密院议长。
description.en: After resigning as Prime Minister, Neville Chamberlain served as Lord President of the Council in Churchill's war cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 姚安娜是孟晚舟的异母妹妹。
description.en: Yao Anna is Meng Wanzhou's half-sister.

description.zh-cn: 姚安娜是任正非的女儿。
description.en: Yao Anna is the daughter of Ren Zhengfei.

description.zh-cn: 应美国司法互助要求逮捕并拘留孟晚舟。
description.en: Arrested and detained Meng Wanzhou at the request of the U.S. for judicial assistance.

description.zh-cn: 在孟晚舟回国时发布微博表示欢迎，称其为自己的榜样。
description.en: Welcomed Meng Wanzhou's return to China with a Weibo post, calling her a role model.

description.zh-cn: 邀请华罗庚建立中国科学院数学研究所。
description.en: Invited Hua Luogeng to establish the Institute of Mathematics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

position.zh-cn: 助教、讲师、正教授、数学系主任
position.en: Teaching Assistant, Lecturer, Full Professor, Head of Mathematics Department

description.zh-cn: 1931年起在清华大学工作学习，先后任助教（1933年）、讲师（1934年）、正教授（1937-1945年）。1950年回国后担任数学系主任。
description.en: Began working and studying at Tsinghua University in 1931, successively serving as a teaching assistant (1933), lecturer (1934), and full professor (1937-1945). After returning to China in 1950, he became the head of the mathematics department.

description.zh-cn: 在1950年代后期的反右斗争中曾遭受冲击和批判。
description.en: He was impacted and criticized during the Anti-Rightist Campaign in the late 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中曾遭受冲击和批判。
description.en: He was impacted and criticized during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在反右斗争、文化大革命等政治运动中，华罗庚受到毛泽东的特别关照和保护。
description.en: During political campaigns such as the Anti-Rightist Campaign and the Cultural Revolution, Hua Luogeng received special attention and protection from Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在反右斗争、文化大革命等政治运动中，华罗庚受到周恩来的特别关照和保护。
description.en: During political campaigns such as the Anti-Rightist Campaign and the Cultural Revolution, Hua Luogeng received special attention and protection from Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 1952年9月加入中国民主同盟，1979年起任副主席。
description.en: Joined the China Democratic League in September 1952 and served as its Vice Chairman from 1979.

description.zh-cn: 邱毅曾于电视节目上声称蔡洁生为日本关东军工作，负责维修零式战斗机。
description.en: Chiu Yi claimed on a television program that Tsai Chieh-sheng worked for the Japanese Kwantung Army, responsible for maintaining Zero fighters.

description.zh-cn: 批评蔡洁生去世后其私人墓园墓碑的题字。
description.en: Criticized the inscription on the tombstone in Tsai Chieh-sheng's private cemetery after his death.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，捷克斯洛伐克加入华沙公约组织，与东欧大部分共产主义国家结成军事同盟。
description.en: In 1955, Czechoslovakia joined the Warsaw Pact, forming a military alliance with most of the communist countries in Eastern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 由于水门事件导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职，时任副总统杰拉尔德·福特继任成为美国总统。
description.en: Following President Richard Nixon's resignation due to the Watergate scandal, Vice President Gerald Ford succeeded to the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 明仁是昭和天皇的长子。
description.en: Akihito is the eldest son of Emperor Shōwa.

description.zh-cn: 明仁是香淳皇后的长子。
description.en: Akihito is the eldest son of Empress Kōjun.

description.zh-cn: 德仁是明仁的长子。
description.en: Naruhito is the eldest son of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 明仁经由其家庭教师伊莉莎白·格雷·维宁的介绍与驻日盟军总司令麦克阿瑟见面。
description.en: Akihito met with Douglas MacArthur, the Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers, through an introduction by his tutor, Elizabeth Gray Vining.

description.zh-cn: 1992年10月，明仁天皇访华期间，与时任中共中央总书记江泽民会见。
description.en: In October 1992, during his visit to China, Emperor Akihito met with then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国家主席杨尚昆邀请明仁天皇伉俪访问中国。
description.en: Then-President of China Yang Shangkun invited Emperor Akihito and his wife to visit China.

description.zh-cn: 德仁是明仁的长子和皇位继承人，在其父于2019年4月30日退位后，于次日即位为天皇。
description.en: Naruhito, the eldest son and heir of Akihito, ascended to the throne as Emperor on the day after his father's abdication on April 30, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国于1948年在美国占领军的支持下建立。
description.en: The Republic of Korea was established in 1948 with the support of the U.S. occupation forces.

description.zh-cn: 周作人在日本留学时，曾师从章太炎学习《说文解字》。
description.en: While studying in Japan, Zhou Zuoren was a student of Zhang Taiyan, learning the 'Shuowen Jiezi'.

position.zh-cn: 国史编纂处编纂、文科教授、东方文学系主任、图书馆馆长、文学院院长
position.en: Compiler at the National History Compilation Office, Professor of the Faculty of Arts, Head of the Department of Oriental Literature, Director of the Library, Dean of the Faculty of Arts

description.zh-cn: 周作人自1917年起在北京大学任职，抗战期间留守北平后，于1939年起担任汪精卫政权下的北京大学图书馆馆长及文学院院长等职务。
description.en: Zhou Zuoren worked at Peking University starting in 1917. After staying in Beiping during the Anti-Japanese War, he served as the Director of the Peking University Library and Dean of the Faculty of Arts under the Wang Jingwei regime from 1939.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，奉系军阀张作霖下令绞死了李大钊等20余名国民党及共产党员。
description.en: In 1927, warlord Zhang Zuolin ordered the execution by hanging of Li Dazhao and over 20 other Kuomintang and Communist party members.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争结束后，国民政府于1945年12月以汉奸罪名逮捕周作人，并将其判刑监禁，直至1949年1月释放。
description.en: After the end of the Anti-Japanese War, the Nationalist Government arrested Zhou Zuoren in December 1945 on charges of treason and imprisoned him until his release in January 1949.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，周作人遭到红卫兵的批斗和殴打，家产被查封，最终在迫害中于1967年5月去世。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution began, Zhou Zuoren was denounced and beaten by Red Guards, his property was confiscated, and he eventually died amid the persecution in May 1967.

description.zh-cn: 根据周作人日记记载，毛泽东于1920年4月7日拜访了他。
description.en: According to Zhou Zuoren's diary, Mao Zedong visited him on April 7, 1920.

description.zh-cn: 在收到周作人的信后，毛泽东批示“养起来，做翻译工作”，使得周作人能在中华人民共和国成立后以翻译为生。
description.en: After receiving a letter from Zhou Zuoren, Mao Zedong instructed to 'support him and let him do translation work,' which allowed Zhou Zuoren to make a living as a translator after the founding of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 1206年，铁木真在鄂嫩河源头召开忽里勒台，即皇帝位，建立大蒙古国，并获得“成吉思汗”的尊号。
description.en: In 1206, at a kurultai on the banks of the Onon River, Temüjin was acknowledged as emperor, establishing the Great Mongol State and receiving the title of 'Genghis Khan'.

description.zh-cn: 窝阔台是成吉思汗的第三子。
description.en: Ögedei was the third son of Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥是拖雷的长子。
description.en: Möngke was the eldest son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥是蒙古帝国的第四位大汗，也是最后一位统治整个统一帝国的蒙古大汗。
description.en: Möngke was the fourth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire and the last to rule over a united empire.

description.zh-cn: 元朝被明朝推翻后，其残余势力退回蒙古高原，史称北元。
description.en: After the Yuan dynasty was overthrown by the Ming, its remnants retreated to the Mongolian Plateau, historically known as the Northern Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 明朝攻陷元大都，元廷北撤，标志着作为统一帝国的蒙古帝国最终瓦解。
description.en: The Ming dynasty's capture of the Yuan capital Dadu and the retreat of the Yuan court to the north marked the final dissolution of the Mongol Empire as a unified entity.
